pathAssistantSteps.info:
Congratulations! Your opportunity is now Closed-Won.


Forecast Guidance:

  • Closed

The objective of this stage is to identify potential opportunity.


The following MUST be completed to move this opportunity to the Next Stage:


1. Add at least one Contact to the Opportunity and assign Role (Contact Roles Related List)


2. Identify and enter initial assessment of all qualification criteria (see key fields)


3. Enter "Amount" to reflect estimated value of opportunity (see key fields)


4. Enter/Verify segmentation criteria (see Segmentation Information section)


Forecast Guidance:

  • Default Forecast Category for 'Create' stage is 'Not Forecasted'


Reminders:

  • If Prospect, obtain ERP ID prior to adding product; request Customer account creation once ready (Account Object, Master Data Request)

The objective of this stage is to position the Illumina Solution


 The following MUST be completed to move this opportunity to the Next Stage:


1. Summarize your Customer's Next Steps (see key fields).

2. Add products to opportunity by configuring Apttus cart.

3. Indicate Competitor name (see key fields).

4. Validate Ultimate Consignee default value; change if necessary.


Reminders:

  • Update Close Date and/or Forecast Category, if needed
  • Identify Primary Contact before generating Quote (Contact Roles)
  • If Prospect, obtain ERP ID prior to adding product; request Customer account creation once ready (Account Object, Master Data Request) 


Forecast Guidance:

  • Default Forecast Category for 'Develop' stage is 'Not Forecasted'

Reminders:

  • Update Close Date and/or Forecast Category, if needed
  • Purchase Order Number and Date will be auto-populated once received, and opportunity will close automatically.


Forecast Guidance:

  • Default Forecast Category for 'Finalize' stage is 'Commit'

The objective of this stage is to reach mutual agreement. 


 


The following MUST be completed to move this opportunity to the Next Stage:

1. Indicate Win Strategy (see key fields)


2. Indicate Competitor name (see key fields)


3. Indicate date Customer Account Creation requested, if necessary (see key fields)


Reminders:

  • Update Close Date and/or Forecast Category, if needed
  • If Prospect, request Customer account creation (Account Object, Master Data Request)


Forecast Guidance:

  • Default Forecast Category for 'Negotiate & Resolve' stage is 'Commit'

The objective of this stage is to demonstrate the Illumina Solution. 


The following MUST be completed to move this opportunity to the Next Stage:


1. Identify Primary contact (will receive Quote) for this opportunity (Contact Roles Related List)

2. Finalize Cart, Generate Quote and Send Proposal to Customer

3. Provide value for Rev Rec Terms for this opportunity (see key fields)


Optional: 

1. Indicate the date your Customer confirmed Solution Fit ** (see key fields) 


Reminders:

  • Update Close Date and/or Forecast Category, if needed
  • If Prospect, request Customer account creation once ready (Account Object, Master Data Request) 


Forecast Guidance:

  • Default Forecast Category for 'Prove' stage is 'Upside'

The objective of this stage is to confirm the buying need.


The following MUST be completed to move this opportunity to the Next Stage:


1. Identify contact with Main Contact role for this opportunity (Contact Roles Related List)


Optional: 


1. Summarize your Customer's Buying Vision ** (see key fields)

 

Reminders:

  • Update Close Date and/or Forecast Category, if needed
  • Update qualification criteria, if needed
  • Identify Primary Contact before generating Quote (Contact Roles)
  • If Prospect, obtain ERP ID prior to adding product; request Customer account creation once ready (Account Object, Master Data Request) 

 

Forecast Guidance:

  • Default Forecast Category for 'Qualify' stage is 'Not Forecasted'
